CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets clear objectives for account visit, clear understanding CSS role and the clinical needs of the customer, utilization of Winners Guide plans for specific measurable goals for each visit or educational opportunity.
CustomField.label: Planning Details

value.fullName: Did not complete or send objectives/agenda to RCSM 48 prior to visit
value.label: Did not complete or send objectives/agenda to RCSM 48 prior to visit

value.fullName: Does not demonstrate understanding of Clinical role or customers’ needs
value.label: Does not demonstrate understanding of Clinical role or customers’ needs

value.fullName: Did not review or utilize Winners Guide during visit.
value.label: Did not review or utilize Winners Guide during visit.

value.fullName: Unable to achieve measurable goals during planning/visit and/or identify future educational opportunities
value.label: Unable to achieve measurable goals during planning/visit and/or identify future educational opportunities

value.fullName: Completed objectives/agenda and sent to RCSM 48 hours to visit
value.label: Completed objectives/agenda and sent to RCSM 48 hours to visit

value.fullName: Demonstrates understanding of role/responsibilities and is able recognize and meet customer’s needs
value.label: Demonstrates understanding of role/responsibilities and is able recognize and meet customer’s needs

value.fullName: Sets and achieves specific goals for each visit and identifies educational opportunities for future visits
value.label: Sets and achieves specific goals for each visit and identifies educational opportunities for future visits

value.fullName: Completed and sent clear objectives to RCSM 48 hours to visit
value.label: Completed and sent clear objectives to RCSM 48 hours to visit

value.fullName: Demonstrates strong and consistent performance in almost all competencies, skills, and responsibilities.
value.label: Demonstrates strong and consistent performance in almost all competencies, skills, and responsibilities.

value.fullName: Schedules return visit for follow-up and/or new educational opportunities
value.label: Schedules return visit for follow-up and/or new educational opportunities
